thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Forest City Board Shake-Up Could Be a Harbinger for Other REITs

author: Esther Fung
title: Forest City Board Shake-Up Could Be a Harbinger for Other REITs
text:
After nine of 13 members of Forest City Realty Trustâ€™s board agreed to step down last month, investors turned their attention to other real-estate investment trusts that could face board pressure in the coming weeks.
The problem: Shares of many REITs have been flagging for the past year, in part because of worries the property market is nearing a peak and partly because of higher interest rates, which make REITs less attractive.
The...
